name: Satoshi
definition: The unknown person who developed bitcoin, authored the BTC white paper, and devised the first blockchain.

name: Ethereum
definition: An open-source blockchain network developed by Vitalik Buterin that allows developers to create smart contracts.

name: Binance
definition: A cryptocurrency exchange founded by Changpeng Zhao.

name: HODL
definition: A misspelling of 'hold;' to avoid selling Bitcoin, regardless of value.

name: Lambo
definition: The goal of an enthusiastic crypto n00b.

name: Casa
definition: A quick, efficient way to open a payment channel from your home

name: Bitcoin
definition: A decentralized, global digital currency that allows peer-to-peer transactions.

name: cryptocurrency
definition: Digital assets that use cryptography

name: Decentralized
definition: No central authority such as a bank or government.

name: wallet
definition: Digital storage to hold private keys.

name: Dogecoin
definition: Joke cryptocurrency featuring 'Shiba' created by Jackson Palmer

name: Blockfolio
definition: Popular mobile app for cryptocurrency portfolio tracking

name: Lightning
definition: Allows quick transactions of crypto between nodes

name: Shitcoins
definition: Any worthless altcoin

name: Finney
definition: Received the first bitcoin transaction.

name: CryptoSprings
definition: A conference featuring well-known voices of crypto.

name: blockchain
definition: An immutable, digital record of transactions

name: Ross
definition: Creator of the Silk Road Marketplace and currently serving an unfair double life sentence.

name: Litecoin
definition: An early bitcoin spinoff that enables instant payments

name: Monero
definition: A privacy coin

name: key
definition: Secret key that allows bitcoins to be accessed and must be kept secure.
